name: INR_Technologies Website
description: Developed a responsive static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a client, focusing on clean UI and fast performance without backend dependencies.

name: Fyntrest (in work)
description: Currently working on a responsive startup website frontend with React and Tailwind MongoDB and Node.js. Focuses on delivering a modern and scalable UI for future integration with backend services.

name: React-native App (in work)
description: Assigned to develop the frontend for a client's app using React native in typescript and expo, ensuring a smooth UI and responsiveness across devices. Coordinated with backend developers for API integration.

name: Drone Image Processing
description: Flask-based system to process drone-captured videos by comparing frames to detect changes such as new buildings, vehicles, or people. Deployed as a web service for accessibility.

name: Laptop Ads Project
description: Developed a system to detect laptop backs and replace them with digital ads for a news channel. Implemented bounding box detection and perspective correction using computer vision.

name: Food Classification Research
description: Contributed to a research paper comparing YOLOv8n, InceptionV3, and VGG19 for Indian meal classification. Conducted experiments, analyzed results, and helped author the publication.
